body:
Normally, if you visit the profile of a user who is blocking you or a user you are blocking, you will either see "@User has blocked you" or "You are blocking @User".

If @User has a private profile, these pages will not show up.
body_html:
Normally, if you visit the profile of a user who is blocking you or a user you are blocking, you will either see "@User has blocked you" or "You are blocking @User".

If @User has a private profile, these pages will not show up.

guild.description:
See a bug while using Ruqqus? File it here and we'll open an issue for the Ruqqus devs to resolve. Before posting, look around first to see if the bug hasn't already been filed. If so, just upvote it or leave a comment to show your support. When a bug is resolved, the status will be reported back in the original thread.

Please only use this guild to file _bugs_. For suggestions or feature requests, use +Ruqqus or +BetaFeedback.
guild.description_html:
See a bug while using Ruqqus? File it here and we'll open an issue for the Ruqqus devs to resolve. Before posting, look around first to see if the bug hasn't already been filed. If so, just upvote it or leave a comment to show your support. When a bug is resolved, the status will be reported back in the original thread.

Please only use this guild to file bugs. For suggestions or feature requests, use +Ruqqus or +BetaFeedback.
guild.name: RuqqusBugs

title: "@User is blocking you" and "You are blocking @User" pages do not show up if @User has a private profile

body: Before filing this, wanna make sure I understand what actually happens. I'm not blocked by anyone AFAICT so cant test this myself. What do you actually see on the page and what do you expect to see?
body_html: Before filing this, wanna make sure I understand what actually happens. I'm not blocked by anyone AFAICT so cant test this myself. What do you actually see on the page and what do you expect to see?

body:
Let's say I am blocking @User.

* What I see if I visit @User's profile if @User has a private profile: @User's profile
* What I see if I visit @User's profile if @User does not have a private profile: "You are blocking @User"
* What I expect to see either way: "You are blocking @User"

Let's say @User is blocking me.

* What I see if I visit @User's profile if @User has a private profile: @User's profile
* What I see if I visit @User's profile if @User does not have a private profile: "@User has blocked you"
* What I expect to see either way: "@User has blocked you"

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
Let's say I am blocking @User.

  • What I see if I visit @User's profile if @User has a private profile: @User's profile
  • What I see if I visit @User's profile if @User does not have a private profile: "You are blocking @User"
  • What I expect to see either way: "You are blocking @User"

Let's say @User is blocking me.

  • What I see if I visit @User's profile if @User has a private profile: @User's profile
  • What I see if I visit @User's profile if @User does not have a private profile: "@User has blocked you"
  • What I expect to see either way: "@User has blocked you"

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
